de.weltraumschaf.commons.swing

Class MenuItemBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.weltraumschaf.commons.swing.MenuItemBuilder

  • public final class MenuItemBuilder
extends Object
    Builder to create a menu item.

    You should not use this class directly. Instead use MenuBarBuilder.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private JMenuItem menuItem
      The built item.
      private static OperatingSystem OS
      Used for OS specific differences.
      private MenuBuilder parent
      The menu builder which creates the menu to which item will belong.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MenuItemBuilder

        MenuItemBuilder(String name,
               MenuBuilder parent)
        Package private constructor. This sub builder is constructed by the MenuBuilder.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the item.
        parent - Constructing menu builder.

    • Method Detail

      • getMenuItem

        JMenuItem getMenuItem()
        Get the built item.
        Returns:
        Always return the same instance per builder.

      • addListener

        public MenuItemBuilder addListener(ActionListener listener)
        Add a listener to the item.
        Parameters:
        listener - Action listener to handle events.
        Returns:
        Returns the builder itself.

      • setAccelerator

        public MenuItemBuilder setAccelerator(char accelerator)
        Add an accelerator key. For Mac OS with mask InputEvent.META_DOWN_MASK for all other systems InputEvent.CTRL_DOWN_MASK.
        Parameters:
        accelerator - Accelerator key character.
        Returns:
        Returns the builder itself.

      • end

        public MenuBuilder end()
        Call if ready with building the menu item.
        Returns:
        The parent menu builder.
